column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=You say on your website that you are working on an idea for a new show .
#Text=Can you tell us a bit more about that ?
#Text=Theres not much I can say about doing a new show apart from the fact that whatever I did I would insist on retaining my integrity .
#Text=My shows have all been optimistic and upbeat which I would have thought the essential ingredients of any TV to take us through a recession .
#Text=Do n't think I could do the nasty vote -the -others off type show .
#Text=I certainly would n't be happy adhering to the clicheed scripts so many celebs seem happy to stick to and you will never see Rico Daniels wearing a frock on the Paul O Grady show .
#Text=Seems a step too low for a bit of cash .
#Text=When you go out looking for materials , presumably you never know what you 're going to find .
#Text=When you look at what 's available , how do you come up with a vision of what you 're going to make from it ?
#Text=The best work I do grows over time .
#Text=I have hundreds of galvanised boxes full of " components " .
#Text=I like assembling the elements of a build to be like a piece of art .
#Text=TV demands a faster pace than I normally like which was fun though at some point I would like people to see what can really be created with a bit of care and careful planning .
#Text=You are also into a bit of axe throwing , I understand .
#Text=Do you ever do this competitively ?
#Text=My axe throwing which has been more implied than seen was something that I started doing at " western " camps in Germany .
#Text=It was organised as a competition there hitting a range of targets on marked posts .
#Text=I use it now as a way of letting off steam .
#Text=I also throw circular saw blades usually at a target I call WMD Tony .
#Text=Chills you right out .
#Text=As you rightly mentioned when you announced your new show concept , it is very hard to get a hold of money these days in any sizable amount - people are holding on to it .
#Text=What effect has this got on salvaging - will it encourage it as people look for alternatives , or will the supply of cheap materials be decreased ?
#Text=I have always found an increase in the amount of stuff available in a recession .
#Text=A lot more people turn to DIY , ripping out salvageable stuff that a man such as myself could use .
#Text=I have seen tons of good gear as I ve been going round London over the last fortnight .
#Text=It broke my heart to leave it in the skips .
#Text=Between writing for Brit Chopper magazine and customizing your jeep , you clearly enjoy the open road .
#Text=What do you look for in a vehicle ?
#Text=Given the chance to have any one ride you wanted , what would you be driving ?
